entity_id.description: ID of the entity being migrated at the current site.

other_site_name.description: Name of the site from which the entity was migrated.

entity_id_at_other_site.description: ID of the entity at the other site where migration occurred.

migrated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the migration took place.

entity_type.description: Type of entity being migrated (e.g., customer, subscription).

status.description: Current status of the site migration process.

object.description: Type of object being migrated (e.g., user, data).

custom_fields.description: Custom fields associated with the site migration detail.
